attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I HAVE A SMALL BUILDING COMPANY EMPLOY 8 TO 12 PERSONS AND 4 VANS.THIS WILL CRIPPLE ME AS MOST OF OUR WORK IS IN LONDON,AND ALSO PAYING CONJESTION CHARGES.THINK OF US AND NOT YOUR BALANCING THE BOOKS.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name. Also, please do not use BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
